name: Nairobi National Park Safari
description: Experience a unique wildlife safari just minutes from the city center. See lions, giraffes, zebras, and more against the backdrop of Nairobi's skyline.

name: David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust
description: Visit the famous elephant orphanage and watch baby elephants being fed and playing in the mud. A heartwarming conservation experience.

name: Karura Forest Hike
description: Explore over 50 km of trails through indigenous forest, see stunning waterfalls, caves, and enjoy picnic spots in this urban oasis.

name: Giraffe Centre
description: Feed endangered Rothschild giraffes from an elevated platform and learn about conservation efforts to protect these gentle giants.

name: GoDown Arts Centre
description: Immerse yourself in Nairobi's vibrant creative scene with exhibitions, performances, and workshops from Kenya's top artists.

name: Bomas of Kenya Cultural Show
description: Experience traditional dances, music, and lifestyle exhibitions representing Kenya's diverse ethnic groups in an engaging performance.

name: Nairobi Railway Museum
description: Step back in time and discover Kenya's railway heritage with vintage locomotives, photographs, and artifacts from the historic 'Lunatic Express'.

name: GP Karting
description: Feel the adrenaline rush as you race around Nairobi's premier go-karting track, perfect for friends and family competitions.

name: Nairobi National Museum
description: Explore Kenya's rich heritage through prehistoric fossils, cultural artifacts, bird exhibits, and beautiful botanical gardens.

name: Village Market Shopping & Entertainment
description: Shop, dine, and enjoy entertainment at this expansive mall featuring a waterpark, bowling alley, and regular cultural market days.

name: Paradise Lost Cave & Waterfall
description: Discover prehistoric caves, boat ride on peaceful lakes, and enjoy picnics by cascading waterfalls at this scenic recreational park.

name: Mamba Village Centre
description: Watch crocodile feeding, ride horses, enjoy boat rides, and feast on crocodile meat at East Africa's largest crocodile farm.

name: KICC Rooftop View
description: Take in breathtaking 360-degree panoramic views of Nairobi's skyline from the rooftop of this iconic skyscraper.

name: Nairobi Ice Skating
description: Experience the thrill of ice skating in Africa at Kenya's only ice rink, perfect for beginners and experienced skaters alike.

name: Kitengela Hot Glass Studio
description: Watch skilled artisans create stunning glass art pieces using traditional techniques and browse the gallery of colorful works.

name: Ngong Hills Hike
description: Embark on a scenic hike across the famous hills with rewarding views of Nairobi city on one side and the Great Rift Valley on the other.

name: Nairobi Safari Walk
description: Take a guided boardwalk tour through different habitats and see Kenya's wild animals up close in naturalistic enclosures.

name: Kazuri Beads Workshop
description: Tour a fair-trade ceramic bead factory employing local women, see how handmade beads are created, and shop for unique souvenirs.
